message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  It's a fantastic opportunity for your business, and I believe it's worth $1200000.  This price reflects the value I know it holds for you, and I'm confident it will be a great investment. Let me know your thoughts!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I'm not comfortable with the price of $1200000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but $900000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $1050000? This price still reflects the value this product brings to your business, and it allows us both to find common ground.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $1050000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $950000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your flexibility, but $950000 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1000000. This price is still a good deal for you, and it allows us to finalize this transaction. Let's make this happen!

I understand that you're willing to come down, Alice, but $1000000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $920000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and my budget. I'm getting close to my limit, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
